name: Adventure Rage Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This DLC contains 7 tracks composed by Kaitai The Maid.

Kaitai The Maid - I Like Waka Flocka Because My Sister Says He Is Cool.
Kaitai The Maid - hateful.
Kaitai The Maid - wrong.
Kaitai The Maid - outrageous.
Kaitai The Maid - Far Eastern Magic Nap Society of Summer.
Kaitai The Maid - Leaves.
Kaitai The Maid - Never Knows Best.
